summary: A man with a troubled past tries to settle down in a small town, finds love and then ends up being the target of a witch hunt.
cast: James Van Der Beek|Sarah Carter|AJ Michalka|Rick Roberts|Peter MacNeill|James Thomas|Allie MacDonald|Zoë Belkin|Thomas Mitchel|Jefferson Brown|Brittany Scobie|Maria Vacratsis|Sidney Leeder|Shauna MacDonald|Douglas E. Hughes|Jonathan Potts|Kiana Madeira|Victoria Fodor|Brian Frank|Alex Ozerov|Marc Andrew Smith
title: El círculo de Salem Falls
